sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>unique_data_mapping</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AutoGenerate Business Rules</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
	gr.addQuery('collection',current.table);
	gr.addQuery('name','CS_PreventDuplicates');
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next())
		{
			if(gr.active == false)
				{
					gs.addInfoMessage("Setting Business Rule CS_PreventDuplicates on Table "+current.table+" to Active");
					gr.setValue('active', true);
					gr.update();
				}
		} else {
			gs.addInfoMessage("Adding Business Rule CS_PreventDuplicates on Table "+current.table+" to Active");
			gr.get('147c3d53483b10102ec811b44d00a81f'); //Getting the Template BR
			gr.setValue('name','CS_PreventDuplicates');
			gr.setValue('active', true);
			gr.setValue('collection', current.table);
			gr.insert();			
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 04:32:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>22cd511748f710102ec811b44d00a8e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AutoGenerate Business Rules</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_22cd511748f710102ec811b44d00a8e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-17 04:32:52</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=22cd511748f710102ec811b44d00a8e7"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7870d55b48b710102ec811b44d00a89e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UniqueDataUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>This utility is used to calculate whether duplicate records exist and to generate new business rules for on insert events.</description><name>UniqueDataUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UniqueDataUtil = Class.create();
UniqueDataUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	foundDupe: function(current)
	{
		var dupeArr = [];

		var dupeConfigs = new GlideRecord('unique_data_mapping');
		dupeConfigs.addQuery('active',true);
		dupeConfigs.addQuery('table', current.getTableName());
		dupeConfigs.query();
		while(dupeConfigs.next())
		{
			if(dupeConfigs.composite_key == true)
			{
				dupeArr.push(this._compositeKey(current, dupeConfigs.getValue('none_duplicate_fields')));
			} else {
				var fields = dupeConfigs.getValue('none_duplicate_fields').split(',');
				for(var i=0;i<fields.length;i++){
					dupeArr.push(this._uniqueField(current, fields[i]));
				}
			}
		}

		if(dupeArr.indexOf(true) > -1)
			return true;
		else
			return false;
	},

	_compositeKey: function(current, fields)
	{
		var fieldsArr = fields.split(',');
		var gr = new GlideRecord(current.getTableName());
		gr.addQuery('sys_id','!=',current.getUniqueValue());
		for(var f=0;f<fieldsArr.length;f++)
			{
				gr.addQuery(fieldsArr[f],current.getValue(fieldsArr[f]));
			}
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				gs.log("Table: "+gr.getTableName()+" Conflicting Record: "+gr.getUniqueValue(),"Common Sense - Dupe Prevention");
				return true;
			}
		else
			return false;
	},

	_uniqueField: function(current, field)
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord(current.getTableName());
		gr.addQuery(field, current.getValue(field));
		gr.addQuery('sys_id','!=',current.getUniqueValue());
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				gs.log("Table: "+gr.getTableName()+" Conflicting Record: "+gr.getUniqueValue(),"Common Sense - Dupe Prevention");
				return true;
			}
		else
			return false;
	},

	type: 'UniqueDataUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 01:20:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>7870d55b48b710102ec811b44d00a89e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UniqueDataUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7870d55b48b710102ec811b44d00a89e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-17 22:09:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CS_PreventDuplicates</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var dupeUtil = new global.UniqueDataUtil();
	if(dupeUtil.foundDupe(current))
	{
		gs.addErrorMessage('Duplicate Record Found Please Check the Logs');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-17 22:20:40</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d3f3afc5907120102ec8d15971dab0c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CS_PreventDuplicates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d3f3afc5907120102ec8d15971dab0c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-17 22:20:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d3f3afc5907120102ec8d15971dab0c0"/></record_update>

	if(dupeUtil.foundDupe(current))
	{
		gs.addErrorMessage('Duplicate Record Found Please Check the Logs');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 04:37:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c75eb9db483b10102ec811b44d00a8ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CS_PreventDuplicates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c75eb9db483b10102ec811b44d00a8ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-11-10 02:59:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c75eb9db483b10102ec811b44d00a8ae"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f72c606f483350102ec811b44d00a8b2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UserCriteria</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Globally Accesible function to test if user can see catalog item.
This script include was made via cloning the UserCriteriaDiagnosticsUtil Script include and modifying it so that it can be called via widgets and other script includes.</description><name>UserCriteria</name><script><![CDATA[var UserCriteria = Class.create();
UserCriteria.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	testCriteria: function(request) {
		/*
		 * request Object
		 * request.userId = users sys_id
		 * request.itemId = catalog_item sys_id
		 * request.isCatalogItem = true/false
		 */

		var uclist;
		var itemId;
		var userId;
		var CATALOG = 'catalog';
		var CATALOG_ITEM = 'catalog_item';
		var CATEGORY = 'category';

		function _fetchUserCriteriaData() {
			var matches;
			var idNameMap = {};
			var results = [];
			var isCatalogItem = "" + request.isCatalogItem;
			var mToMTableName = 'sc_cat_item_user_criteria_mtom';
			var noMToMTableName = 'sc_cat_item_user_criteria_no_mtom';
			var columnName = 'sc_cat_item';
			if (isCatalogItem === 'false') {
				mToMTableName = 'sc_category_user_criteria_mtom';
				noMToMTableName = 'sc_category_user_criteria_no_mtom';
				columnName = 'sc_category';
			}
			var itemIncludedCriteria = _fetchAssociation(mToMTableName, columnName, itemId);
			var itemNotIncludedCriteria = _fetchAssociation(noMToMTableName, columnName, itemId);
			var matchingAvailableUC = SNC.UserCriteriaLoader.getMatchingCriteria(userId, itemIncludedCriteria);
			var matchingNotAvailableUC = SNC.UserCriteriaLoader.getMatchingCriteria(userId, itemNotIncludedCriteria);

			idNameMap = _getUserCriteriaNameMap(itemIncludedCriteria.concat(itemNotIncludedCriteria));
			for (var i = 0; i < itemNotIncludedCriteria.length; i++) {
				matches = matchingNotAvailableUC.indexOf(itemNotIncludedCriteria[i]) !== -1;
				results.push({
					type: "Not Available",
					uc: itemNotIncludedCriteria[i],
					matches: matches,
					name: idNameMap[itemNotIncludedCriteria[i]]
				});
			}
			for (i = 0; i < itemIncludedCriteria.length; i++) {
				matches = matchingAvailableUC.indexOf(itemIncludedCriteria[i]) !== -1;
				results.push({
					type: "Available",
					uc: itemIncludedCriteria[i],
					matches: matches,
					name: idNameMap[itemIncludedCriteria[i]]
				});
			}

			return results;
		}

		function _fetchAssociation(tableName, column, id) {
			var items = [];
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
			gr.addActiveQuery();
			gr.addQuery(column, id);
			gr.addNotNullQuery('user_criteria');
			gr.addNotNullQuery(column);
			gr.query();
			while (gr.next()) {
				items.push(gr.getValue('user_criteria'));
			}
			return items;
		}

		function _getUserCriteriaNameMap(ids) {
			var idNameMap = {};
			var criteriaGr = new GlideRecord('user_criteria');
			criteriaGr.addQuery("sys_id", "IN", ids);
			criteriaGr.query();
			while (criteriaGr.next()) {
				idNameMap[criteriaGr.getValue("sys_id")] = criteriaGr.getValue("name");
			}
			return idNameMap;
		}

		function _getAndParseData(itemId, userId) {
			var catItem = new sn_sc.CatItem(itemId);
			var itemDetails = catItem.getItemSummary();
			var itemCatalogs = itemDetails.catalogs;
			var i = 0,
				j, itemCategories = [];
			var children;
			var categoryObject, catalog, categoryTree;
			var allChildren = [];

			while (i < itemCatalogs.length) {
				itemDetails.categories = [];
				// Add catalog in tree
				children = [{
					name: itemCatalogs[i].title,
					sys_id: itemCatalogs[i].sys_id,
					active: itemCatalogs[i].active,
					type: CATALOG,
					viewable: itemCatalogs[i].active
				}];

				itemCategories = [];
				var gr = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item_category");
				gr.addQuery("sc_cat_item", itemId);
				gr.addQuery("sc_category.sc_catalog", itemCatalogs[i].sys_id);
				gr.query();
				while (gr.next()) {
					itemCategories.push(gr.getValue("sc_category"));
				}
				j = 0;
				while (j < itemCategories.length) {
					categoryTree = catItem.getCategoryTree(itemCategories[j]);
					categoryObject = new sn_sc.CatCategory(categoryTree.sys_id);
					catalog = categoryObject.getCatalog();

					if (catalog === itemCatalogs[i].sys_id) {
						itemDetails.categories.push(categoryTree);
					}
					j++;
				}
				allChildren = allChildren.concat(_getAllChildren(itemDetails.categories, children));
				i++;
			}

			// Add catalog item at the top of tree
			return {
				name: itemDetails.name,
				sys_id: itemDetails.sys_id,
				children: allChildren,
				type: CATALOG_ITEM,
				viewable: _viewable(itemDetails.sys_id, userId, CATALOG_ITEM)
			};
		}

		function _getAllChildren(categories, children) {
			var categoryQueue = [];
			var allCategories = [];
			var node;

			// Add categories
			categories.forEach(function(category) {
				var tempNode, childCategory;
				node = {
					name: category.title,
					sys_id: category.sys_id,
					active: category.active,
					children: children,
					type: CATEGORY,
					viewable: _viewable(category.sys_id, userId, CATEGORY)
				};

				if (category.category && Object.keys(category.category).length) {
					categoryQueue.push(category.category);
				}

				while (categoryQueue.length) {
					tempNode = {};
					childCategory = categoryQueue.pop();
					tempNode = {
						name: childCategory.title,
						sys_id: childCategory.sys_id,
						active: childCategory.active,
						children: [],
						type: CATEGORY,
						viewable: _viewable(childCategory.sys_id, userId, CATEGORY)
					};
					tempNode.children.push(node);
					node = tempNode;
					if (childCategory.category && Object.keys(childCategory.category).length) {
						categoryQueue.push(childCategory.category);
					}
				}
				allCategories.push(node);
			});

			return allCategories;
		}

		function _viewable(id, userId, type) {
			var value, resource;
			switch (type) {
				case CATALOG_ITEM:
					resource = GlideappCatalogItem.get(id);
					return resource.canViewCheck(false, false, user);

				case CATEGORY:
					resource = GlideappCategory.get(id);
					value = resource.canView(false, false, false, user, false);
					return value;

				case CATALOG:
					resource = GlideappCatalog.get(id);
					return resource.canView(false, false, user);
			}
		}

		function _getData(user) {
			return {
				treeData: _getAndParseData(itemId, userId),
				userName: user.getDisplayName()
			};
		}

		function _isUserAuthorised() {
			return gs.hasRole('catalog_admin') || gs.hasRole('catalog_manager');
		}

		function methodToExecute() {
			if (!_isUserAuthorised())
				return;

			var resultJson = {};

			userId = "" + request.userId;
			itemId = "" + request.itemId;
			user = GlideUser.getUserByID(userId);
			resultJson.ucData = _getData(user);
			resultJson.userCriteria = _fetchUserCriteriaData();
			return new JSON().encode(resultJson);
		}
		var response = methodToExecute();
		return response;
	},

	type: 'UserCriteria'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 17:25:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>f72c606f483350102ec811b44d00a8b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UserCriteria</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f72c606f483350102ec811b44d00a8b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-17 18:35:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="DELETE" element="order" table="unique_data_mapping"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Prevent Duplicate Emails Users</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var dupeUtil = new global.CommonSenseDupeUtile();
	if(dupeUtil.foundDupe(current))
		{
			gs.addErrorMessage('Duplicate Record Found Please Check the Logs');
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
		

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 00:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9934459f487710102ec811b44d00a815</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prevent Duplicate Emails Users</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Common Sense" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Common Sense">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9934459f487710102ec811b44d00a815</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-17 01:48:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9934459f487710102ec811b44d00a815"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b720065f483b10102ec811b44d00a8ff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GRUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GRUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var GRUtil = Class.create();
GRUtil.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	getGR: function(table, sys_id, ignoreOOB)
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
		gr.addQuery('sys_id', sys_id);
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				return this.getObject(gr, ignoreOOB);
			}
	},

	getObject: function(gr, ignoreOOB)
	{
		var table = gr.getTableName();
		var fields = [];
		this.getElements(table, ignoreOOB, fields);
		var data = {};
		
		for(var i=0; i<fields.length; i++)
			{
                //initialize the object
                data[fields[i].element] = fields[i];
                //append values to object
                data[fields[i].element].value = JSUtil.notNil(gr.getValue(fields[i].element)) ? gr.getValue(fields[i].element) : null;
                data[fields[i].element].display_value = JSUtil.notNil(gr.getValue(fields[i].element)) ? gr.getDisplayValue(fields[i].element) : null;
				if(fields[i].type == 'Currency')
					{//Currencies require some extra love
                        data[fields[i].element].currency_code = gr[fields[i].element].getCurrencyCode();
                        data[fields[i].element].display_value = gr[fields[i].element].getCurrencyDisplayValue();
                        data[fields[i].element].currency_string = gr[fields[i].element].getCurrencyString();
                    }
                    
                if(fields[i].type.contains('Journal'))
                {
                    data[fields[i].element].journal_entries = gr[fields[i].element].getJournalEntry(-1).split("\n\n");
                }

                if(fields[i].type == 'Document ID')
                {
                    data[fields[i].element].dependent_field = fields[i].dependent_on_field;
                    data[fields[i].element].dependent_field_value = gr.getValue(fields[i].dependent_on_field);
                    data[fields[i].element].dependent_field_display_value = gr.getDisplayValue(fields[i].dependent_on_field);
                }
			}
		
		return data;
		
	},

	getElements: function(table, ignoreOOB, array)
	{

		var fields = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		fields.addQuery('name',table);
		fields.addEncodedQuery('elementISNOTEMPTY');
		if(ignoreOOB)
			fields.addEncodedQuery('internal_type!=collection^ORinternal_typeISEMPTY');//To ignore all the table dictionaries(optional)
		fields.query();
		while(fields.next())
		{
			var obj = {};
			obj.element = fields.getValue('element')+'';
			obj.column_label = fields.getValue('column_label')+'';
			obj.type = fields.getDisplayValue('internal_type')+'';
			obj.mandatory = fields.getDisplayValue('mandatory')+'';
			obj.read_only = fields.getDisplayValue('read_only')+'';
			//Getting and applying dictionary overrides
			this._applyOverrides(table, obj);
			if(obj.type == 'Choice' || obj.type == 'String' || obj.type == 'Integer')
				{
					obj.choices = [];
					var choice = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
					choice.addEncodedQuery('name='+table+'^element='+obj.element);
					choice.query();
					while(choice.next())
						{
							var temp = {
								value: choice.getValue('value'),
								display_value: choice.getValue('label')
							};
							
							obj.choices.push(temp);
						}
				}
			if(obj.type == 'Reference' || obj.type == 'List')
				{
					obj.reference = fields.getValue('reference');					
				}
            
            if(obj.type == 'Document ID')
            {
                obj.dependent_on_field = fields.getValue('dependent_on_field');
            }
			array.push(obj);
		}
		
		var db_obj = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		db_obj.addQuery('name',table);
		db_obj.query();
		if(db_obj.next())
			{
				if(JSUtil.notNil(db_obj.super_class))
					{
						this.getElements(db_obj.super_class.name,ignoreOOB,array);
					}
			}
	},
	
	_applyOverrides: function(table, obj)
	{
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary_override');
		gr.addQuery('name',table);
		gr.addQuery('element',obj.element);
		gr.query();
		if(gr.next())
			{
				obj.mandatory = gr.getDisplayValue('mandatory_override')+'';
				obj.read_only = gr.getDisplayValue('read_only_override')+'';
			}
	},

	type: 'GRUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>geni.palla</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-17 04:46:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>b720065f483b10102ec811b44d00a8ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GRUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Unique Data Rules" source="16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unique Data Rules">16c1899b487710102ec811b44d00a88a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b720065f483b10102ec811b44d00a8ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>geni.palla</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-17 04:46:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
